name: Koha-php-extras
tagline: PHP Staff Utilities for the Open Source Koha ILS (Integrated Library System), for protected Intranet only.
body:
# Koha Extras - Beta

These add-ons will require some knowledge of apache/php installation and some minor PHP programming skills for custimization. 

KohaExtras is a test suite written in PHP for various ideas for Koha. 
PHP Staff Utilities for the Open Source Koha ILS (Integrated Library System)
Koha Extras - Beta These add ons will require some knowledge of apache/php installation and some minor PHP programming skills for customization.

### Authors:
Darrell Ulm
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
